source.title: Vittadinia

leads.lead_text: Non-glandular hairs of vegetative parts strigose, stiff, appressed (or spreading on stems)
Non-glandular hairs of vegetative parts spreading of if appressed, fine and often curled
Hairs of vegetative parts appressed or nearly so, fine and often curled
Hairs of vegetative parts rather coarse and widely spreading, straight or curved toward the tips
